page.title: 07REAY - CHURCHES
page.content: Within the area marked on the map there is only one church, in the village of Reay itself, on the north side of the main Thurso - Tongue road. It is a very old building, being nearly 250 years old and is of great historic interest because of its almost unique T-plan shape. In this 250 years there have been 12 ministers of the church: 6 in the first 200 years and 6 in the last 50. Concerning the church's involvement in the community, on the one hand, there is direct involvement consisting of Sunday worship, Woman's Guild meetings and a Sunday School; in addition the church gives Christmas parcels to the senior citizens of the parish. On the other hand, however, there is a great deal of involvement of individual christians within the life of the community in all its aspects.
